import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import products from '../products' //distructure match from props const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { // Get the prouductId from url/id, use props.match here const product = products.find((product) => product._id === match.params.id) return (
<> Go Back
) } export default ProductScreen
